descriptionHtml:
Plate armour converted from black desert online. I made it as an addon for Morrowind Style Argonians so it requires the files from that mod and the other mods it requires. Otherwise feel free to create your own esp for yourself.

Craftable and added to leveled lists.

Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6041/?]Morrowind Style Argonians[/url] (doesn't require the esp)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43833/?]Digitigrade Khajiit (requires esp)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52918/?]Better Claws and Gauntlets[/url] (doesn't require the esp)
author: Pearl Abyss and me
